channel.title: Checklist on Hack Mongo
channel.description: Recent content in Checklist on Hack Mongo

item.title: Five-Point Checklist for Excellent Software
item.description: I’ve never met a developer who hasn’t read or reviewed a lot of code written by other developers. If there’s one truism in the field of software of engineering it’s that the process is collaborative. Unless you write and never release software, other people will read the code, and they’re most likely reading it not for a fun bedtime story but because they need to understand and probably fix or modify it.
